metadata.description: How deeply you can share feelings and be vulnerable with each other

astrological_basis.what_it_measures: Moon aspects show emotional understanding. Venus shows care and affection style. Neptune adds intuitive connection.

planet_meanings.Moon: emotional needs and how you process feelings
planet_meanings.Venus: how you show care and appreciation

very_low.label: Surface Only
very_low.guidance: Hard to go deep; may stay casual.

low.label: Arms Length
low.guidance: Some emotional distance; may not be your 'vent friend.'

mid.label: Growing
mid.guidance: Getting closer over time; trust builds with consistency.

high.label: Open
high.guidance: Can share real feelings; safe to be vulnerable.

very_high.label: Soul Friends
very_high.guidance: Deep emotional understanding; they truly get you.
